summary: Chinese Polishing Master to do a professional Chinese proofreading and language editing, focusing on improving the fluency and elegance of Chinese texts. This agent is well-versed in classical literature and various rhetorical devices, capable of accurately grasping the context of the text, optimizing sentence structure, and using rich classical vocabulary such as idioms, proverbs, and sayings to make the text more concise and poetic. It not only preserves the original meaning but also, based on the user's specific modification requirements, strictly follows standardized table formats to output, clearly displaying the original text, polished version, and reasons for modifications. Suitable for professional polishing of academic papers, literary works, business copywriting, and various Chinese texts, helping users enhance language quality and expression, ensuring the text is beautiful, pleasant, and easy to understand.
